iti38:2.1: “Tathagatam, bhikkhave, arahantam sammasambuddham dve vitakka bahulam samudacaranti—
iti38:2.4: Tamenam, bhikkhave, tathagatam abyapajjharamam abyapajjharatam eseva vitakko bahulam samudacarati:
iti38:2.5: ‘imayaham iriyaya na kanci byabadhemi tasam va thavaram va’ti.
iti38:3.2: Tamenam, bhikkhave, tathagatam pavivekaramam pavivekaratam eseva vitakko bahulam samudacarati:
iti38:4.1: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, tumhepi abyapajjharama viharatha abyapajjharata.
iti38:4.2: Tesam vo, bhikkhave, tumhakam abyapajjharamanam viharatam abyapajjharatanam eseva vitakko bahulam samudacarissati:
iti38:4.3: ‘imaya mayam iriyaya na kanci byabadhema tasam va thavaram va’ti.
iti38:5.2: Tesam vo, bhikkhave, tumhakam pavivekaramanam viharatam pavivekaratanam eseva vitakko bahulam samudacarissati:
iti38:9.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavata, iti me sutanti.
